Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 14th overall pick, by Washington in 2015...
Released by Washington on 8/8/2016...
Signed as a free agent by Milwaukee on 8/8/2016 to a minor league deal...
Released by Milwaukee on 8/16/2016...
Signed as a free agent by Arizona on 8/16/2016 to a minor league deal...
Traded from Arizona to Minnesota on 1/31/2017 (Going to MIN: 2B D. Porter, P A. Murff. Going to ARI: 3B D. DeShields Jr, P P. Sanchez)...
Had first career hit on 4/4/2018, off Matt Garza (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/14/2018, off Gary Casiano (NYA)...
Traded from Minnesota to San Diego on 3/2/2020 (Going to MIN: LF T. Williams Jr.. Going to SDN: CF M. Ott Jr., RF D. Porter, SS D. Leal, P A. Javery Jr.)...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Chicago (N) on 9/23/2020...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 2020...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Florida on 8/11/2021...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Atlanta on 8/18/2021...
